Vehicle.Name: Mobquet Flare-V Swoop
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Mobquet Flare-V Swoop[h3] The Mobquet Flare-V is among the fastest swoops on the market, and it is notoriously difficult to pilot. As this combination makes for a highly dangerous vehicle, the Flare-V is generally used only by gangs and truly reckless thrill-seekers.
